## **About the blog** {style="white"}

I have a personal blog called "[The Middle Author Bioinformatician](https://bvalderrama.substack.com/)" where I document my path to avoid becoming just another middle author bioinformatician.

I write about Bioinformatics, Gut Microbiome, The Microbiome-Gut-Brain axis, Science in general and some personal thoughts.
